ZoneText: Cyber fraudster poses as help desk for PF account, dupes man of `1L

Mumbai: A 42-year-old man from Borivli was duped of Rs 1.16 lakh by a cyber fraudster while he was trying to access his wife's Provident Fund details online. A case of cheating has been registered by the MHB Colony police. The complainant was at home and was trying to log into the Employees' Provident Fund Organisation (EPFO) portal online. He keyed in his wife's Universal Account Number (UAN) and tried to reset the password. But he was unable to do it. He then decided to seek help and noticed a toll-free help desk number on
